dia.en: It's very locked. No chance of escape without the key.

The cover by Nine Inch Nails was better.

This looks like the ones at Future Tech. It even has the slot for a digital thing.
It's not nice to call people names.
No, the digital thing, it's called a Fob.
I don't know, the one truthful thing I say and you choose then to have a go at me.
There are some phone numbers scribbled on a note pad.
It's a metal cover on the floor.
Wow that is very spikey. I wonder what it's for?
Wow that is very spikey. I wonder what it's for?

title.en: I know what you are doing Sarah!

dia.en: I know what you are doing Sarah!

title.en: I don't know what to do.

dia.en: I don't know what to do.
Fail safe system offline. Default action: Follow order.

title.en: I don't want to use this after all.

dia.en: I don't want to use this after all.

title.en: Are you really going to kill me? After everything we've been through?

dia.en: Are you really going to kill me? After everything we've been through?
Yeah, why not? You know too much. It's me or you honey. Infact, I should probably start that.
Weapons systems! Kill Dr Ted Martin!
Hmm, I guess it needs calibrating. I'll just do that.

title.en: Please don't kill me! I promise I won't tell anyone!

dia.en: Please don't kill me! I promise I won't tell anyone!

title.en: I don't think you need to do that.

dia.en: I don't think you need to do that.
Hold on, phone call. I won't keep you long.

title.en: You are going to kill me?

dia.en: You are going to kill me?

Yeah, well last night when you came, I implanted a chip in your brain to make you forget everything and try and throw you off remembering what you found out, but that clearly didn't work! So I'll just have to kill you.
To kill you. My weapons system wasn't plugged in.
So I had time to prepare.
I just knocked you out and chained you to a wall.
But you aren't going to tell me are you?
Fine you've gone crazy. I still need to kill you though.
Never. Give me a moment, I'll think of something!
Weapon system! Kill Dr Ted Martin!
Great the microphone is broken! This is all your fault! Why did you never support me in my decissions? I just wanted to be a better woman!
Just as well you're only in my head.
What? Did your implant just say something to you?
